long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blinkr is a simple yet effective tool that helps you monitor and regulate the frequency of your blinking during video calls or extended screen time. With Blinkr, you can easily keep track of your blink rate and take breaks when needed to avoid eye strain.

Our mission is to promote healthy habits and improve the quality of life for people who spend a lot of time in front of screens. Our user-friendly interface and innovative features make it easy for you to take control of your eye health and keep your vision in top shape.

We believe that technology should be designed to improve our lives, not harm them. That's why we've created Blinkr â€“ to help you achieve a healthy balance between screen time and real-life interactions.

So whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who loves to spend time on their device, Blinkr is here to help you keep your eyes healthy and happy. Try it out today!
